name: iflow-docs-cn
description: The Chinese version of iFlow documents.

scripts.docs:build: yarn docs:prepare && gitbook build -g unadlib/iflow-docs-cn && cp assets/favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images
scripts.docs:publish: yarn docs:clean && yarn docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:unadlib/iflow-docs-cn gh-pages --force
